comments:

This problem does not occur in a fresh workspace.
Could you please provide more details on what you were trying to do?

I am able to reproduce this by doing the following:

1.  Check out HEAD stream of org.eclipse.pde.build from dev.eclipse.org
2.  In the Navigator view, right click the plugin.xml -> "Create Ant Build 
File"

I tried re-importing the binary plugins it needs, and I still get the NPE.

Do you have a copy of org.eclipse.core.boot loaded in your workspace, or listed 
in Preferences > PDE > Target Environment.

org.eclipse.core.boot is loaded in the workspace.  In Preferences > PDE > 
Target Platform, org.eclipse.core.boot is listed but unchecked.  When I select 
all, I do not get the NPE.  However, in a separate workspace, I do not have to 
have anything selected in Preferences > PDE > Target Platform in order to 
generate the build.xml file.

For the symptoms, it seems that it is a duplicate from 40537.
Mark as duplicate

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40537 ***
